function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in time in the operating room","Impact":"Decreased resident learning opportunities and technical skill development","Mitigation":"Augment resident learning with simulation and high-quality surgical videos","Technologies":"Simulation equipment, high-quality surgical videos","People":"Residents, medical staff","Owner":"Medical program directors, hospital administrators"},{"Description":"Limited access to simulation equipment","Impact":"Restriction in technical skill development for residents","Mitigation":"Finding ways to provide access to simulation equipment outside the hospital, staff oversight and discussion when viewing videos of questionable quality","Technologies":"Simulation equipment, high-quality surgical videos","People":"Residents, medical staff","Owner":"Medical program directors, hospital administrators"},{"Description":"Variability in quality and content of surgical videos","Impact":"Inconsistency in learning outcomes and potential misinformation","Mitigation":"Ensuring staff oversight and discussion when viewing videos, accessing video libraries from surgical societies","Technologies":"High-quality surgical videos, video libraries","People":"Residents, medical staff","Owner":"Medical program directors, hospital administrators"}]}
